Package lab3

Class CoffeeOrder

java.lang.Object
lab3.CoffeeOrder
public class CoffeeOrder extends Object
Create CoffeeOrders

Define a class named CoffeeOrder. Declare a private string field that holds the coffee type to indicate whether the coffee type is AmericanDark , AmericanRegular, Espresso, Latte or IceCoffee.

Also, declare a private string field that hold the cup size to indicate whether the cup size is S ,M , L or XL.

  • Field Details

    • coffeeType

      private String coffeeType
      The coffeeType can be one of the following choices AmericanDark , AmericanRegular, Espresso, Latte or IceCoffee.

      The default value is IceCoffee

    • cupSize

      private String cupSize
      The cupSize can be one of the following choice S , M , L or XL.

      The default value is L

  • Constructor Details

    • CoffeeOrder

      public CoffeeOrder()
      Default constructor set the attributes to default values

    • CoffeeOrder

      public CoffeeOrder(String coffeeType, String cupSize)
      Constructor create a new CoffeeOrder by assigned coffeeType and cupSize attributes.
      Parameters:
      coffeeType - the coffee type
      cupSize - the cup size
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException -

      if the coffee type is not one of the following choices AmericanDark , AmericanRegular, Espresso, Latte or IceCoffee. or if the cup size is not one of the following choices S, M , L or XL.

      Precondition:

      Precondition

      The coffee type should be one of the following choices AmericanDark , AmericanRegular, Espresso, Latte or IceCoffee.

      and The cup size should be one of the following choices S, M , L or XL.

    • CoffeeOrder

      public CoffeeOrder(CoffeeOrder otherOrder)
      Copy constructor Set the coffee type and cup size by copying another coffee order attributes
      Parameters:
      otherOrder - another coffee order

  • Method Details

    • setCoffee

      private void setCoffee(String newCoffeeType, String newCupSize)
      This method is for internal use. It will help to reduce code duplication. Sets the coffee type and cup size of this coffee order object to newCoffeeType and newCupSize, respectively.
      Parameters:
      newCoffeeType - the new coffee type
      newCupSize - the new cup size
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException -

      if the coffee type is not one of the following choices AmericanDark , AmericanRegular, Espresso, Latte or IceCoffee. or if the cup size is not one of the following choices S, M , L or XL.

      Precondition:

      Precondition

      The coffee type should be one of the following choices AmericanDark , AmericanRegular, Espresso, Latte or IceCoffee.

      and The cup size should be one of the following choices S, M , L or XL.

    • coffeeOrderTime

      public int coffeeOrderTime()
      This method calculate the Coffee Order time. The time needed to prepare the coffee order After determining the coffee order type and size, the coffee order time is calculated the preparation time (in Seconds) as following:

      Preparation time = 2.5 + (coffee order type) + (cup size) * 1.25

      It should be noted that the coffee order time returns the Preparation time in seconds rounded to the largest integer value that is less than or equal to the calculated Preparation time. Furthermore, the coffee order time has the following parameters For coffee type and cup size:

      coffee type

      AmericanDark: 7 Seconds, AmericanRegular: 5 Seconds, Espresso: 9 Seconds, Latte: 8 Seconds, IceCoffee: 4 Seconds,

      Cup size

      S: 1.25 Seconds, M: 2.50 Seconds, L: 3.25 Seconds, XL: 4.6 Seconds

      Returns:
      The Coffee Preparation time in Seconds rounded to the largest integer value that is less than or equal to the preparation time.
